Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The provided process tree model is underfitting and allows unwanted behavior. Current Underfitting Process Tree Model (Pseudocode): parallel_block = ProcessTree(operator=Operator.PARALLEL, children=[create_po, receive_goods, receive_invoice, match_invoice, pay_invoice])

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: a parallel block (AND) for the rest of the steps, allowing them to occur in any order, followed by closing the case. This allows, for example, paying the invoice before receiving goods or receiving the invoice.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: The process is intended to follow this standard logic: 1. Create Purchase Requisition 2. Approve Purchase Requisition 3. Create Purchase Order 4. Receive Goods 5. Receive Invoice 6. Match Invoice to PO 7. Pay Invoice 8. Close Case. The fixed model should retain all the same activities but enforce a sequence and structure that only allows the normal, domain-appropriate order of events.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: The corrected model must replace the parallel block with a structure that enforces the proper sequence. By changing the parallel operator to a sequence operator for the core purchasing activities, the model will ensure that each step logically follows the previous one, thus preventing out-of-order executions and conforming to the domain logic.
